import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add asset to favorites"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/favorites/{assetId}/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds an asset to a user's favorites collection so it appears in quick-access views and ticket shortcuts.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Call [GET /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/list-all-assets) and read `Items[].AssetId` from the returned assets list.
2. **userId** - Call [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) with the user identifier (email, username, or barcode) and capture `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the user: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) to capture `UserId`.
2. List assets: [GET /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/list-all-assets) and select the target `AssetId`.
3. Favorite the asset: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/favorites/\{assetId\}/\{userId\}](/docs/api/assets/add-asset-favorite).

**Minimal Required Fields**
- `AssetId` (path) - The asset to mark as a favorite.
- `UserId` (path) - The user whose favorite list is being updated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Asset GUID to add to favorites. Obtain by calling [GET /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/list-all-assets) and reading `Items[].AssetId` from the response.","example":"7a7f1b13-df5c-4a38-8fe8-0ef0c7f52c32","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"listAllAssets","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/assets","responseField":"Items[].AssetId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"userId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the user whose favorites are being updated. Obtain with POST /api/v1.0/search and read `Item.Users[].UserId`.","example":"11111111-1111-4111-8111-111111111111","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/search","responseField":"Item.Users[].UserId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
